LanguageData.fulfill_outdoors_label: Pawns are encouraged to fulfill their need of outdoors by seeking recreation outdoors
LanguageData.fulfill_outdoors_note: NOTE: Don't place the same joy giving sources both indoors and outdoors, to avoid indecisiveness.
LanguageData.clean_before_working_label: Pawns are encouraged to clean the room before operating a station in it
LanguageData.clean_before_working_note: NOTE: Don't expect pawns who cannot clean to suddenly begin cleaning.
LanguageData.bill_job_pathing_label: Calculate accurate path to the building for bill jobs
LanguageData.bill_job_pathing_note: It'll help to avoid making unreasonable hooks around when your pawns need to bring resources first, but it may be costly on CPU
LanguageData.clean_after_tending_label: Pawns are encouraged to clean the room after tending to a patient
LanguageData.clean_after_tending_note: NOTE: Don't expect pawns who cannot clean to suddenly begin cleaning.
LanguageData.meal_stacking_label: Pawns avoid mixing negative thoughts when stacking meals
LanguageData.meal_stacking_note: That way pawns will never mix disgusting meals with normal ones
LanguageData.dont_count_odd_label: Count odd meat (ex.: insect) as normal, allowing to stack it with normal meals
LanguageData.gen_ingredients_label: Add random ingredients to randomly generated meals
LanguageData.gen_ingredients_note: Ex.: gifted by story teller, sold by a trader, looted from corpse. Only mood neutral components are used. With this option on, the game will never be the same
LanguageData.add_to_que_note: That way pawns will not change their mind after performing an opportunistic task, but sometimes it can cause confusion if a job was already taken
LanguageData.hauling_over_bills_label: Pawns are encouraged to haul ingredients for a bill to a stockpile
LanguageData.hauling_over_bills_note: When working on a bill, pawns will prefer hauling ingredients to a stockpile, instead of taking a small fraction, required for a recipe
LanguageData.drugs_use_potential_mood_label: Pawns are encouraged to take account of potential mood in drug policies
LanguageData.drugs_use_potential_mood_note: Pawns will not use drugs if "potential" mood is above a limit, preventing overuse of drugs to achieve a set mood level.
LanguageData.extended_recipe_label: Recipes display complete list of ingredients
LanguageData.advanced_inbetween_cleaning_label: Pawns will clean rooms in between hauling ingredients and crafting
LanguageData.advanced_inbetween_cleaning_note: Basic behavior would let them clean only before hauling
LanguageData.advanced_haul_all_ings_label: Pawns are encouraged to pick up all ingredients before hauling them to the crafting place
LanguageData.advanced_haul_all_ings_note: Pawns will take all necessary ingredients to their hauling inventory before delivering them to the crafting place
LanguageData.prefer_spoiling_ingredients_label: Pawns are encouraged to use ingredients and materials that are closer to spoiling.
LanguageData.prefer_spoiling_ingredients_note: WARNING: A large amount of items to choose from may cause lag when this option is enabled.
LanguageData.manual_unload_label: Enable a button in colonist's inventory to mark items for hauling to stockpile
LanguageData.manual_unload_note: If there are no stockpiles to haul to, the colonist will drop the item near him
LanguageData.put_back_to_inv_label: Pawns will put items back in their inventory when interrupted
LanguageData.put_back_to_inv_note: When pawns are holding an inventory item in their hands, they'll put them back if action was interrupted
LanguageData.pick_proper_amount_label: Pawns will stop taking more sweets than they can eat
LanguageData.fun_police_label: Pawns are encouraged to fulfill secondary needs during joy assignment, or if woken early
LanguageData.fun_police_note: Pawns will try to top off their joy need only after it goes below 80%, they'll prefer to pick up a spare meal to their inventory, and fulfill all their hygiene needs (if dubs mod is present)
LanguageData.skip_snow_clean_label: Pawns are discouraged from clearing snow from areas when it's snowing or raining
LanguageData.skip_snow_clean_note: When raining just in case if it's a tricky weather
LanguageData.prefer_spoiling_meals_label: Pawns are encouraged to eat meals that are closer to spoiling
LanguageData.prefer_spoiling_meals_note: WARNING: A large amount of items to choose from may cause lag when this option is enabled.
LanguageData.allow_feeding_with_plants_label: Allow and encourage pawns to feed animals with hay.
LanguageData.allow_feeding_with_plants_note: Animals will also be encouraged to prefer non-human food.
LanguageData.give_sick_joy_drugs_label: Pawns are encouraged to give allowed social drugs or joy-giving food to sick pawns
LanguageData.give_sick_joy_drugs_note: Why talk if you can give them a chocolate bar?
LanguageData.social_relax_economy_label: Change how pawns use drugs when relaxing socially to prevent them from "wasting joy"
LanguageData.social_relax_economy_note: Normally pawns sit down for a hour or two before actually consuming the drug, wasting the effect
LanguageData.advanced_cleaning_ingest_label: Pawns are encouraged to clean before eating at a table or relaxing socially
LanguageData.advanced_cleaning_ingest_note: Pawns will clean around the table where they're planning to sit
LanguageData.mood_regen_label: Pawn's mood slowly moves towards 50% while they're asleep if possible
LanguageData.mood_regen_note: Just let pawns "sleep on it" and they should be fine
LanguageData.safe_wander_label: Pawns are encouraged to avoid bad weather when wandering aimlessly
LanguageData.safe_wander_note: Just stop walking out into the toxic fallout, you idiots
LanguageData.polite_wander_label: Any friendly pawns are encouraged to avoid wandering into bedrooms, prison cells and prison barracks
LanguageData.polite_wander_note: This is just indecent or even dangerous, isn't it?
LanguageData.ingest_any_drugs_label: Allow to take any drugs from inventory
LanguageData.ingest_any_drugs_note: If it's ingestible, it should be possible to eat it without dropping on the ground
LanguageData.DoCleanCompToggleDescActive: Pawns will clean around this bench
LanguageData.DoCleanCompToggleDescInactive: Pawns will NOT clean around this bench
LanguageData.advanced_inbetween_cleaning_gizmo_label: Show a toggle to be able switch which benches need cleaning
LanguageData.advanced_inbetween_cleaning_gizmo_note: It will be possible to disable cleaning around some benches
